snippet.title: Office Fight Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
You’ve been unfairly laid off by Mega Corp and the news kills you. Literally. But your restless ghost has unfinished business… REVENGE! ‘Restructure’ Mega Corp one department at a time, unleashing hilarious physics-based chaos as you uncover their diabolical secrets 👻

One part therapy, three parts anarchy, Office Fight lets desk jockeys everywhere launch a cappuccino into the face of the status quo. 

Office Fight: Work sucks. Break stuff!

------------------------------------------

Wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2747060/Office_Fight

------------------------------------------

📲  LINKS  📲

➫ Website: https://www.office-fight.com 
➫ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@officefight 
➫ Twitter: https://twitter.com/OfficeFightGame  
➫ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/MZHW8McbWq 
➫ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/office_fight   
➫ YouTube:  https://www.youtube.com/@OfficeFightGame 

Stay tuned for the official release date by subscribing to our channel.

#OfficeFight #Gaming #indiegame #ragdollphysics #steam #officefight
